name: ArrowPlane
description:
*Please read*

To be able to shoot, you have to lock on to enemies by typing the combination beneath them. After you have locked on to at least 2 enemies, press spacebar to shoot at them. 

Thanks to the early comments I realized that this was not explained very well in the game, will update it after the jam is over.

Fly around as you take out your enemies by pressing a combination of arrows and spacebar. Survive as long as possible by getting upgrades from killing bosses.

~Controls~

WASD - movement

Arrow Keys - combo

Space - shoot

~If you just want some chaos~

i - get random upgrade 

o - Increase difficulty

This game was made for Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022. I had this idea for the longest time but never got around to making it and since it kind of fit the theme, I thought why not and made this. This was a solo project with some help from my brother on the music and title art while all other assets were taken from www.kenney.nl.
